direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods validate ISIN codes but return different types of results (boolean vs. Object).
The validate method depends on checkCode for country code validation.
The validate method in CodeValidator can be substituted with the validate method in ISINValidator for similar validation purposes.
The isValid method in CodeValidator can be substituted with the isValid method in ISINValidator for similar validation purposes.
The getInstance method is used to obtain the appropriate ISINValidator instance, which is a dependency for the validate method.
